subject: Order # SSN6273
description_text:
Hello I placed and order and am asking what carrier you use for shipping. If it’s the USPS I need to add a mailbox to the shipping. I left it out thinking it would be UPS or FEDEX due to size or weight but could you PLEASE add the POBOX 463
Please please please. Thankyou!
Ross Campoli

conversations.body_text: Oh nevermind. I read your shipping page and says you do not deliver to PO Box’s so I guess I panicked over nothing. Haha. Thanks for your time anyways
